title: El Salvador Core Inflation Rate
description: Core consumer prices in El Salvador increased 5.26 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Core Inflation Rate in El Salvador averaged 0.86 percent from 2010 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 5.26 percent in September of 2022 and a record low of -1.36 percent in January of 2010. This page provides - El Salvador Core Inflation Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Dirección General de Estadística y Censos - DIGESTYC
